name: Improved Critical

sections.text: Your critical multiplier with your chosen weapon is increased by 1 (to a maximum of ×6).
sections.name: Benefits

sections.text: You can gain this feat multiple times. The effects do not stack. Each time you take this feat, it applies to a different non-mythic Improved Critical feat.
sections.name: Special

description: Your critical strikes with your chosen weapon are deadlier than most.
